hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported that Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) forbade (people) taking vows, and said:It does not (necessarily) bring good (in the form of substantial, and tangible results), but it is the meant whereby something is extracted from the miserly persons

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ النَّذْرِ، وَأَنَّهُ، لاَ يَرُدُّ شَيْئًا
chapter.eng-name: he Prohibition Of Vows, And Confirmation That They Do Not Avert Anything
